channel.title: Cornell Juggle Php Juggling on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Cornell Juggle Php Juggling on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: last night was a mess...
item.description: so lasts nights performance was lame. I mean it was OK from a juggling perspective. we barely dropped and we “looked” good.. hehe. (pictures to come)- but the show was dumb. I wish we had a real band to juggle with. heh. This site is really great. I really enjoyed the pictures. so I made a script that picks a random one and displays it. the script is here. just keep reloading.
